Reviews.Title: Well designed.
Reviews.Author: Wise One
Reviews.Content: Fantastic phone.Pros:Very fast, very customizable which is important to me as I like to make everyhing look different.Beautiful speeds between all the apps i have, very well designed software in this product, good size for messaging alot.Not the best camera but pretty nice for the cost.Good looking phone, comes with a screen protector already installed basically.. just peal of the top layer... definitly something all phones should come with!!!Plus a phone with a duel processor at 1.2gb is pretty decently fast and if your wondering... you CAN add and Micro SD card into this phone to increase the size, it didn't state very well anywhere and i figured someone else would probably be wondering that because now it has an additional 32gb's to it.Cons:My sim card came defective but in no way does that effect the rating because i doubt that it was the the manufacturers problem, more of net10 plus they sent me a new one very quickly to resolve the problem!Verdict:Great phone for the price... well designed hardware and software... and as long as the rest of the sim cards aernt broken its definitly a phone for anyone. (EASY TO USE :D! )

Reviews.Title: Came from a IPHONE 4s
Reviews.Author: Jeremy R Redmond
Reviews.Content: I love this phone I can connect to my Xbox live account listen to music on my skydrive this phone dominates the IPhone 4s and even 5C AND S

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Alex Bertin
Reviews.Content: Excellent smart phone for the price, great battery, windows phone is awesome!! Zero complaint!!Only down side is about the international plan: don't waste an extra $15 a month on it, it's a real pain in the *** to use since you have to call a particular toll free number to, then, dial the number of the person you wish to reach... Use viber!

Reviews.Title: Great phone but NOT great service with Net 10
Reviews.Author: Sweet Lynnie
Reviews.Content: I have been with Net 10 for over 3 years now and they have went to h*** with their service. Now this phone seems great! Problem being is that after a week I still can not use it. Net 10 told me the SIM that came with it was no good. Then argued that I must have put an old SIM in the phone which I certainly did not. They will not compensate me for time, money, and effort lost. After being told my new SIM was in the mail they said the order was cancelled. I had to reorder a SIM. 3 times I asked for a supervisor only to be very rudely refused. I will never use Net 10 again after this. There are other cool phones out there and if I were you before spending over 200.00 on a phone that you will have to take forever to even use, I would shop for a different phone and service plan all together.

Reviews.Title: yes!
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: this phone is fast and zippy. i like that i get 4g speeds in my area since its a metropolitan area. the os is beautiful and slick. my only problem with it is that it doesn't have too many apps but i mean its a great phone!! i totally recommend it to everyone!!

Reviews.Title: self explainatory lol
Reviews.Author: Dulce Muniikiita
Reviews.Content: its a Net10 phone comes packaged. it is new thats pretty much it. what you see advirtised is what your getting.

Reviews.Title: Good phone.
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: I am a little disappointed it will not upgrade to Windows 8.1 I put a 32MB SD card in mine and it sits mostly empty because I can't save my email to it. When you connect it to your computer you can move some things around like it was an USB drive, so that helps. I have mine on NET 10 and it has good data reception 80% of the time and when at home the WiFi is great.

Reviews.Title: False advertisement
Reviews.Author: Michael
Reviews.Content: Well lets cut to the chase.... I mainly spent the extra money on this phone just to have a phone with a wifi hotspot which is what they advertised it had but I found out they disabled that function on this phone so I spent extra cash for nothing. Personally I won't be happy unless they ship me a phone that has the working wifi hotspot capability.o
